thread.section_title: Flologic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flologic | flologic.com
thread.title: RR Gasparilla Island
thread.title_full: Flologic reviewed by RR Gasparilla Island

author: RR Gasparilla Island
title: RR Gasparilla Island
text: Flologic was installed in a new vacation rental home 8 years ago. No issues or repairs. It stopped water flow a couple times due to a toilet flapper not being fully closed. Water would have run continuously for several weeks while the vacation home was vacant. Water / sewer bill would have been way more than the cost of Flologic. Set it and forget it.
